about_the_game:
Introducing Party Maniacs Rules: Get ready for a wild adventure where a bunch of crazy party animals
break all the rules of normal parties. As the party spirit meets a mix of different bashes, brace
yourself for a hilarious plan that takes nightlife to the next level. In this crazy game, set against the
backdrop of late 90s and early 00s nostalgia, you'll dive into a party world like no other.

Party Maniacs Rules is all about having fun with friends in short, wild party scenarios. Your goal? Create
chaos, score points with wild stunts, and enjoy the hilariously crazy action.


What's inside:

Real-life party simulation with crazy, non-linear fun.
Lots of replay value and potential for streaming fun.
Physics-based fun and wacky animations.
Unique tools with exaggerated powers (Leaf Blowers, Vacuum Pressure Cleaners, Cannons,
Booster Rockets) for over-the-top antics.
Multiple ways to tackle objectives.
Team up with friends for wild objectives and playful challenges.
Use funny superpowers for a unique twist.
A side of dark humor and crazy storytelling.
Meet quirky characters and experience late 90s and early 00s party culture.


Party Like Never Before:

Explore different party spots, from the suburbs to luxurious villas.
Take on over 200 unique objectives and 100+ challenges.
Get your hands on over 15 crazy "weapons," from potato cannons to foam generators.
Interact with more than 15 distinct characters, each with their own hilarious traits.
Unlock 10+ hilarious superpowers, including the water addict, electro man, and grappling hook.
Party Rules? Nah! Party Maniacs Rules is all about letting your imagination run wild. Earn points by
doing all sorts of crazy stuff like messing with NPCs, cleaning up, cooking, and causing chaos.
Each objective has tons of ways to complete it, so get ready for your unique style of party
madness.

Team Up for Insanity: Join forces with friends to tackle objectives together. Use Leaf Blowers to
blow away crowds, whip up delicious drinks, and pull off hilarious pranks for non-stop laughter.
As you dive into the crazy world of Party Maniacs Rules, expect the unexpected, embrace the chaos,
and create unforgettable party moments that defy reality. So, grab your buddies, get ready to
mess with gravity and decorum, and crash the ultimate bash in Absurdville's wild world of
celebration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
